items.title: Overview to Risk Management (How about a career in Risk?)
items.headline: Understand how the ISO31000 global standard can help you better manage risks in your personal and work life
objectives_summary: This is an introductory course.  In this course, students will get an introduction and Overview into what is risk. They will understand why risk cannot be avoided. They will see how the  ISO 31000 methodology and roadmap  can be used to manage risk, and also what is involved in starting the risk implementation
